file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://corona-virus-stats.herokuapp.com/api/v1
info:
  description: Free API documentation to get Real time corona virus stats
  title: COVID19 Stats
  version: v1
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - open_data
  x-origin:
    - format: openapi
      url: http://corona-virus-stats.herokuapp.com/api/v1/docs/?format=openapi
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: corona-virus-stats.herokuapp.com
security:
  - Bearer: []
paths:
  /cases/countries-search:
    get:
      description: search a country
      operationId: cases_search
      parameters:
        - description: A search term.
          in: query
          name: search
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: "Inform the page. Starting with 1. Default: 1"
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: "Limit per page, Default: 20."
          in: query
          name: limit
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  count:
                    type: integer
                  next:
                    format: uri
                    nullable: true
                    type: string
                  previous:
                    format: uri
                    nullable: true
                    type: string
                  results:
                    items:
                      $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountryStats"
                    type: array
                required:
                  - count
                  - results
                type: object
          description: ""
      tags:
        - cases
    parameters: []
  /cases/general-stats:
    get:
      description: Get the general stats
      operationId: cases_general-stats_list
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/GeneralStats"
                type: array
          description: ""
      tags:
        - cases
    parameters: []
  /docs/:
    get:
      description: ""
      operationId: docs_list
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
      tags:
        - docs
    parameters: []
components:
  schemas:
    CountryStats:
      properties:
        active_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: Active cases
          type: integer
        cases_per_mill_pop:
          nullable: true
          title: Cases per mill pop
          type: number
        country:
          maxLength: 200
          minLength: 1
          title: Country
          type: string
        flag:
          maxLength: 200
          nullable: true
          title: Flag
          type: string
        last_update:
          format: date-time
          title: Last update
          type: string
        new_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: New cases
          type: integer
        new_deaths:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: New deaths
          type: integer
        serious_critical:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: Serious critical
          type: integer
        total_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: Total cases
          type: integer
        total_deaths:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          nullable: true
          title: Total deaths
          type: integer
        total_recovered:
          maxLength: 200
          nullable: true
          title: Total recovered
          type: string
      required:
        - country
      type: object
    GeneralStats:
      properties:
        cases_with_outcome:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Cases with outcome
          type: integer
        created_at:
          format: date-time
          readOnly: true
          title: Created at
          type: string
        critical_condition_active_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Critical condition active cases
          type: integer
        currently_infected:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Currently infected
          type: integer
        death_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Death cases
          type: integer
        death_closed_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Death closed cases
          type: integer
        deleted:
          title: Deleted
          type: boolean
        id:
          minLength: 1
          readOnly: true
          title: Id
          type: string
        last_update:
          format: date-time
          title: Last update
          type: string
        mild_condition_active_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Mild condition active cases
          type: integer
        recovered_closed_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Recovered closed cases
          type: integer
        recovery_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Recovery cases
          type: integer
        total_cases:
          maximum: 9223372036854776000
          minimum: -9223372036854776000
          title: Total cases
          type: integer
        updated_at:
          format: date-time
          readOnly: true
          title: Updated at
          type: string
      required:
        - total_cases
        - death_cases
        - recovery_cases
        - currently_infected
        - cases_with_outcome
        - mild_condition_active_cases
        - critical_condition_active_cases
        - recovered_closed_cases
        - death_closed_cases
        - last_update
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    Bearer:
      in: header
      name: Authorization
      type: apiKey

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/cases/countries-search": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: field results: item: field active_cases: int validator: set maximum: 9223372036854776000 overflows
